means: 易变的，不稳定的，富于变化的

sentence.Network_en: Consciousness is partial and changeful, awareness is total, changeless, calm and silent.
sentence.Network_cn: 意识是片面和变迁的, 觉性则是整体 、 不变 、 平静而无声.

sentence.Network_en: Abundant color and changeful design mate a more comfortable environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 此涂料色彩丰富、图案变化多样,让人感觉更舒适.

sentence.Network_en: Coastal landform is changeful, much cliff, have extensive bay and beach again.
sentence.Network_cn: 海岸地形多变, 多悬崖峭壁, 又有辽阔的海湾与沙滩.
